allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
add R3 power features: multi-select, bulk actions, label CRUD, keyboard nav, Zod validation

- Multi-select with SelectionProvider context, checkbox wiring, bulk toolbar
- Keyboard list navigation \(j/k/o/x/e/#/s\) with focused row highlight
- Label management: create/edit/delete modals, label picker, server actions
- Zod validation on all server actions
- Accessibility: aria-labels, dialog focus traps, scroll lock, role=checkbox
- Security: escapeHtml for XSS prevention, escapeLikePattern for SQL injection,
  session ownership checks on label assignment and deletion

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
